intent_atoms.description: Implement automation to refresh MP4RABoxes.json from the upstream MP4RA registry and publish a repeatable maintenance workflow for keeping the catalog current.
A scripted or documented automation path retrieves the latest MP4RA registry data (HTML, CSV, or JSON) and regenerates MP4RABoxes.json without manual editing.
Running the automation updates metadata versioning markers (timestamp, source URL, or hash) and verifies schema compatibility with existing catalog consumers.
A maintenance guide covers prerequisites, execution steps, validation checks, and contribution workflow updates so other contributors can refresh the catalog confidently.
Decide whether the automation lives as a Swift command, Python script, or documented manual recipe; align tooling with existing repository scripting conventions.
Validation hooks must surface warnings during tests or CI for stale or malformed catalog data to prevent regressions in downstream validation/reporting tasks.
